Public Remarks: A desirable lot for recreation because it is zoned R3A. Water, sewer, hydro and telephone are available at the lot line. This zoning allows motor homes, or trucks and campers, to be hooked up to: Hydro, Village water and sewer. The fishing for char and salmon nearby on Babine Lake is making these lots desirable.
